channel.title: Comments on: And that’s how Tyler and I were able to have Fight Club every night of the week
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: Glad to see things worked out for you, Drey.
item.content:encoded: Glad to see things worked out for you, Drey.

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description: Yeah!!!!!!! House of Whack deserves it, damnit. The game is damn good, and it's only right that the DEA should do something good for you.
item.content:encoded: Yeah!!!!!!! House of Whack deserves it, damnit. The game is damn good, and it’s only right that the DEA should do something good for you.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Wow, that's like something out of a story. Nice to see just desserts get handed out once in a while.
item.content:encoded: Wow, that’s like something out of a story. Nice to see just desserts get handed out once in a while.
